strapiPost.title: Drury GO Celebrates Farmington Chamber of Commerce Membership with Ribbon Cutting
strapiPost.content:
Last Tuesday, Drury GO welcomed the community to their Farmington campus to celebrate its new membership with the Farmington Chamber of Commerce with a ribbon cutting. Together, they will continue the initiative to bring affordable education and scholarship opportunities to the community.

Start Here: With the fall semester right around the corner, academic advisors are on campus helping students enroll, schedule classes, and answer questions for anyone interested in completing a post-secondary degree or earning a certificate to advance their career.

Your Way: Take affordable courses in the fields of Business, Leadership, & Communication; Public Service & Safety; and Health & Behavioral Science. Learn entirely online or in a hybrid format, including in-person courses with experienced instructors and direct access to guidance counselors.

Enrollment for Fall 2023 is still open. Start your application or request more information HERE.
